useCase.name: Implementing Design Guides
useCase.description: As a Designer, I want to utilize existing design guides and standards to improve the design process.

preconditions.precondition: The Designer has access to the Guide Repository and CMS.

successEndConditions.condition: Guides and standards are successfully applied in the design process.

useCase.trigger: Designer requests existing guides and standards.

mainSequence.step: Designer requests existing guides and standards from Team Member.
Team Member shares the link to the Guide Repository and CMS access with Designer.
Guide Repository displays available guides (Style, Design, Content) to Designer.
Designer reviews and compiles relevant information from the guides.
Designer applies the guides in the design process using CMS.
CMS confirms the application of guides by Designer.
Designer updates the repository with new/modified guides.
Guide Repository confirms the update to Designer.
Designer shares the updated guides with Team Member.
Team Member reviews and provides feedback on the guides.
Team Member confirms the adoption of the guides to Designer.
